mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.name,r.path,r.duration,r.coverurl,IFNULL(u.finish,0) finish,IFNULL(u.progress,0) progress FROM resource r LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `user_resource` WHERE account = #{account} ) u ON r.id=u.`resource_id`;
mapper.insert: insert into user_resource(resource_id, account, finish, progress) value(#{resource_id},#{account},#{finish},#{progress})
